description.value: On a successful Strike, the attack deals an additional 2d6 force damage, and the target must succeed at a DC 19 Fortitude save or be knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Prone]{Prone}. If the hit with the rhino shot was a critical success, the target is knocked prone unless it critically succeeds at its save.

rules.text: Rhino Shot The target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19|name:Rhino Shot|traits:damaging-effect,force,conjuration,consumable,magical|showDC:all] save or be knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Prone]{Prone}.

Rhino Shot The target must critically succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19|name:Rhino Shot|traits:damaging-effect,force,conjuration,consumable,magical|showDC:all] save or be knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Prone]{Prone}.
